sentence.Network_en: Ulcerative colitis and granulomatous colitis affect many children and young adults.
sentence.Network_cn: 溃疡性结肠炎和肉芽肿性结肠炎常侵害儿童和刚成年的年青人.

sentence.Network_en: Aberrant larvae may lodge in the liver, producing granulomatous lesions and hepatomegaly.
sentence.Network_cn: 蛔蚴可误入肝门, 引起肉芽肿性损害及肝肿大.

sentence.Network_en: Chronic granulomatous disease ( CGD ) is an inherited immunodeficiency disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 慢性肉芽肿病 ( CGD ) 是一种遗传性的免疫缺陷疾病.
